text: 5.8: Ais 59.17; Ef 6.13-17Nza mɨn thugim, nza raar ki gumgi, nza ndɨkndɨgi bigi kaŋgip wari ganɨv kɨrga. Nza vhɨra guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨva ndigip, ana zɨn ŋgɨp, guigira won ndavi ndi harigi gumgi gu mbigi nɨɨŋri. Mba tɨv, nza siot kapa shari tɨvar muuŋgip, ana shɨrari. Ana nden fhavi ganɨrim, nde nzerara kɨrga. Nza ana sharav, nza Fhe Bakɨme taagip nza ndirganen rargɨ kɨrga tɨv, nza kapa khorar fi tɨvar muuŋgip, ana fav kɨrga. Mba ndɨkndɨk, ana nza panan kɨv, nza ndɨkndɨgi ganɨnga. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip tuituigip thɨgɨ havhargip, wari ganɨ kɨrga.
